instructions: You can open INDB files with Adobe InDesign in Windows and macOS. To open an INDB file with InDesign, select File â†’ Open..., choose the INDB file, and click Open. You can also double-click the INDB file to open it if it is associated with InDesign.
Books can be accessed via the Book panel within InDesign. Books are separate from documents (INDD files), since one or more documents are used for populating the contents of the book.
